item.title: Version 1.2.3
item.description:
feat: Implement automatic appcast generation from GitHub Releases

  • Add GitHub Actions workflow to auto-generate appcast.json on new releases
  • Create Python script to fetch releases from GitHub API and convert markdown to HTML
  • Deploy appcast.json to GitHub Pages (gh-pages branch) for CDN delivery
  • Update SUFeedURL to use GitHub Pages instead of raw.githubusercontent.com
  • Only include latest release in appcast to reduce file size
  • Preserve EdDSA signatures from existing appcast
  • Add comprehensive documentation (APPCASTAUTOUPDATE.md, QUICK_SETUP.md)
  • Ignore appcast.json in git since it's auto-generated

Benefits:

  • No manual appcast maintenance required
  • No need to pull changes (deployed to separate gh-pages branch)
  • Automatic release notes from GitHub Release descriptions
  • Faster delivery via GitHub Pages CDN

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
